summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 INFINITI M35. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V028000 (AIR BAGS) FOR THE FRONTAL PASSENGER AIR BAG INFLATOR; HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT CALLED THE LOCAL DEALER (HARTE INFINITI, LOCATED ON 150 WESTON ST, HARTFORD, CONNECTICUT, 06120) AND WAS INFORMED THAT PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE, BUT WOULD MAYBE BE AVAILABLE IN DECEMBER. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
